subject: general meeting held about y
body:
general meeting held about your fund delivery, the paying bank of UGANDA
(ABC Bank Uganda Limited )
approved your delivery through a conformable  DHL DELIVERED COURIER
SERVICE COMPANY  to  delivery your  ATM CARD to you doorstep as ask
you mead the payment to them , in act to uphold the rule of law which
we represent . You
have to reconfirm the information below for security reasons. And also
be informed that delivery agent will leave this country as soon as you
comply with
(Courier)Company requirement,
E-MAIL ADDRESS OF THE DHl: ( 
dhrequirement_delivery1@outlook.com
)
Best regards,
Mr. Akello  Emmanuel(Chairman of Board of Directors)

subject: Re:   general meeting held about y
body:
Hello Mr. Akello Emmanuel,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about the ATM card delivery! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about this fund delivery? What is it for exactly?

Also, could you provide more details about the DHL DELIVERED COURIER SERVICE COMPANY? How does the process work?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Hubert
